name: Escape If You Can 3 (Room Escape challenge games)
name_original: Escape If You Can 3 (Room Escape challenge games)
description:
Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

Disappearance happened in this house,then there often occurs the paranormal,Is it the cause of the ghost.You act as a wither.you must find out what happened.
Investigating this odd apartment,Find out the evil spirits, and destroy them.

Magnificent puzzles,Stunning story
Beautifully rendered backgrounds that will pull you in and never let you go!
Beautiful soundtrack perfectly suited to this eerie and haunting world.
Auto-save feature , never lose your progress again.
